ai-tha-ap179:1.1_0: “Take a sage who sees the path
ai-tha-ap179:1.4_0: like a single-human in the same way.
ai-tha-ap179:2.1_0: When continued existence has become extinguished,
ai-tha-ap179:2.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
ai-tha-ap179:3.3_0: The moon on the bright hill
ai-tha-ap179:4.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
ai-tha-ap179:5.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Bhūmija.
ai-tha-ap179:6.1_0: is the seventh training of the senior.
ai-tha-ap179:6.2_0: The ninth section on the brother.
